Ratan Tata

Former Chaiman of Tata Group

Here's a time line of Ratan Tata's life:

  • 1937 - Born in Bombay(Mumbai), India
  • 1959 - Enrolled at Cornell University
  • 1970 - In the 1970s Tata was given a managerial position in the Tata group
  • 1991 - In 1991, J. R. D. Tata stepped down as chairman of Tata Sons, naming Ratan Tata as his successor.
  • 2000 - Ratan Tata received the Padma Bhushan in 2000
  • 2008 - Ratan Tata received the Padma Vibhushan in 2008

"I don't believe in taking right decisions, I take decisions and make them right."

Read more about Ratan Tata on Wikipedia.
